sentences.en: A camel can bear burden.
sentences.cn: 骆驼能驮重.

sentences.en: A camel has a big hump on its back.
sentences.cn: 骆驼背上有个很大的驼峰.

sentences.en: Earth tones are definitely big for this season, and camel will fit in with trends such as Queen's Country, Town meets Country and the like seamlessly.
sentences.cn: 大地色无疑是这一季的主打，驼色也非常适合“王室风范”“大都市遭遇乡村风尚”这些流行系列，并且配合得天衣无缝。

sentences.en: He grew up in an Air village, making the annual camel caravan with his father.
sentences.cn: 他在阿伊尔高原的一个村庄长大，每年跟随父亲参加骆驼商队。

sentences.en: He went across the Sahara on a camel.
sentences.cn: 他骑骆驼穿过撒哈拉大沙漠.

sentences.en: I wonder what the ECL on a half-camel is.
sentences.cn: 我想知道半骆驼的有效人物等级是多少。

sentences.en: My animal had a quarter - moon back and a camel gait.
sentences.cn: 我的这头牲口的弓背象一弯新月,迈步象骆驼一样缓慢.

sentences.en: One of them said, " Hey Xiangzi, Camel, you've got a cushy job!
sentences.cn: 有的就说: “ 祥子, 骆驼, 你这差事美呀!

sentences.en: Our journey by camel was quite an unforgettable experience.
sentences.cn: 我们骑骆驼旅行真是一次难忘的经历。

sentences.en: Strain at a gnat and swallow a camel.
sentences.cn: 小事拘谨,大事糊涂.

sentences.en: Suddenly a camel let out a plaintive ay, not far away.
sentences.cn: 骆驼忽然哀叫了两声, 离他不远.

sentences.en: The camel can bear a heavy load.
sentences.cn: 骆驼能负重.

sentences.en: The camel had such a long neck.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的脖子很长.

sentences.en: The camel has a game leg.
sentences.cn: 那只骆驼有一只腿瘸.

sentences.en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentences.en: The favorite , of course , is camel.
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色.

sentences.en: The favorite, of course, is camel.
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.en: Then came the recession. Revenues dropped, but the straw to break the camel's back was the war.
sentences.cn: 之后出现了经济衰退，财政收入下降，但致命的打击还是那场战争。

sentences.en: When fresh food and water are not available, the camel can feed off its hump.
sentences.cn: 在得不到新鲜食物和水的时候, 骆驼可以消耗它肉峰内储存的脂肪维持生命.

sentences.en: When fresh food and water are not available,the camel can feed off its hump.
sentences.cn: 在没有新食物和水供应时，骆驼从它的驼峰中获取能量。

words.tran_cn: [畜牧][脊椎]骆驼；打捞浮筒；工作作风官僚

trans.tran_en: a large desert animal with a long neck and either one or two  hump s (= large raised parts )  on its back
